医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
基因疗法的突破为严重的Dravet综合征病例提供了希望AAV-NAVβ1基因治疗可有效地减少癫痫发作并延长SCN1B连接Dravet综合征的小鼠模型，从而为将来的治疗铺平道路。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250218/gene-therapy-therapy-breakthrough-offers-hope-for-severe-severe-dravet-syndrome-cases.aspx.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250218/gene-therapy-breakthrough-offers-hope-for-for-severe-dravet-syndrome-cases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=61f2C8AA-7F00-4B48-974B-CDE612B4EF3C Tue, 18 Feb 2025 05:03:00 -0500 Gene therapy breakthrough offers hope for severe Dravet syndrome cases
怀孕晚期的空气污染与新生儿的NICU入院有关出生前接触交通污染物的暴露与NICU入院率有关，这强调了解决空气质量对新生儿健康的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250218/air-pollution-in-late-pregnancy-link------- nicu-nicu-admissions-for-newborns.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250218/air-pollution-in-late-pregnancy-link--nicu-nicu-nicu-admissions-forn-newborns.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=36536c67-9b72-4965-862e-d52510630879 Tue, 18 Feb 2025 04:09:00 -0500 Air pollution in late pregnancy linked to higher NICU admissions for newborns
间歇性禁食如何影响β细胞功能和糖尿病风险研究表明，短期禁食改善了葡萄糖的调节，而小鼠的长期禁食会损害β细胞功能，从而可能增加T1D风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250218/how-does-intermittent-fasting-fasting-ceb2-celle-function-function-function-and-diabetes-and-diabetes-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250218/how-does-intermittent-fasting-fasting-ceb2-celle-function-function-function-and-diabetes-and-diabetes-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A6DA9F81-2340-431C-8E63-4C0BAB13D080 Tue, 18 Feb 2025 03:27:00 -0500 How does intermittent fasting affect β cell function and diabetes risk
科学家将代谢失败当作衰老肌肉丧失的原因一项多词的研究表明，分支链氨基酸（BCAA）分解代谢受损是肌肉减少症的主要驱动力，这表明它是潜在的治疗靶标。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/scientists-pinpoint-metabolic-failure-as-the-cause-failure-as-the-cause-of-muscle-loss-in-aging.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/scientists-pinpoint-meterabolic-failure-as-the-cause-failure-as-the-cause-of-muscle-loss-in-aging.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2E8E9D16-C3D3-4E96-9305-36705A01B7F4 Mon, 17 Feb 2025 23:35:00 -0500 Scientists pinpoint metabolic failure as the cause of muscle loss in aging
无癌症18年：CAR-T治疗设定了神经母细胞瘤治疗中的新里程碑一项针对自然医学的开创性研究表明，GD2 CAR-T细胞疗法可导致神经母细胞瘤儿童的长期缓解，其中一名患者保持了18年以上的癌症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/cancer-free-for-18 are-car-t-therapy-sets-new-milestone-in-new-milestone-in-neuroblastome-warteatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/cancer-free-for-18-aild-car-car-t-therapy-sets-new-milestone-in-new-milestone-in-neuroblastome-warteatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f52ff7cb-d6AA-41F5-B154-D4B568529925 Mon, 17 Feb 2025 23:15:00 -0500 Cancer-free for 18 years: CAR-T therapy sets new milestone in neuroblastoma treatment
益生菌会增强运动表现吗？研究人员发现，益生菌可能会增强运动员的耐力，恢复和免疫功能，但是强度和功率性能的证据仍然有限。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/do-probiotics-enhance-sports-performance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/do-probiotics-enhance-sports-porterance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id= efc17585-d0dd-4e1f-b78a-3EE470F33AAA1 Mon, 17 Feb 2025 23:03:00 -0500 Do probiotics enhance sports performance?
汗液在心脏病发作后跟踪炎症时无法匹配血液研究人员发现，尽管汗水生物标志物保持稳定，但血浆生物标志物在心脏病发作后显示出显着的炎症变化，突出了汗水分析以跟踪恢复的局限性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/weat-fails-to-match-match-bact-blood-in-tracking-inflammation-felter-harpter-shread-attacks.aspxs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/weat-fails-to-match-match-blood-in-in-tracking-inflammation-inflammation-felter-hernt-attacks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7b9944a4a4a4a4-18d8-416d-b725-b725-b84b4ab9ee97 Mon, 17 Feb 2025 22:25:00 -0500 Sweat fails to match blood in tracking inflammation after heart attacks
Nidus-Family Care软件包降低了痴呆症支持成本NIDUS家庭护理包装使用目标设定来帮助痴呆症患者在家中寿命更长。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/nidus-family-care-package-reduces-duces-dementia-support-costs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/nidus-family-care-package-reduces-duces-dementia-support-costs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=AEA3C2FB-F040-4973-A037-A037-0B5EC39D6D6EAF Mon, 17 Feb 2025 21:05:00 -0500 NIDUS-Family care package reduces dementia support costs
蠕动泵送运动可触发淀粉样蛋白形成大阪大学的研究人员发现，蠕动泵的作用和高剪切动力会促进淀粉样蛋白成核。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/peristaltic-pumping-motion-found-found-to-trigger-trigger-amyloid-formation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/peristaltic-pumping-motion-found-found-to-trigger-trigger-amyloid-formation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=680E010A-665F-4D43-87E4-7C434EC72CDC Mon, 17 Feb 2025 20:59:58 -0500 Peristaltic pumping motion found to trigger amyloid formation
全球报告强调需要更好地使用医用氧气根据新的全球报告，通用通用通道，国家路线图和更实惠和可访问的护理目标对于填补影响世界一半以上人口的医疗氧气差距至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/global-report-highlights-the--need-for-better-better-access-to-to-medical-oxygen.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/global-report-highlights-the--need-for-better-better-access-to-to-medical-oxygen.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=29E7DA51-1B95-4135-4135-AD39-09885C40F083 Mon, 17 Feb 2025 20:52:00 -0500 Global report highlights the need for better access to medical oxygen
